name: palawan-tourism-ecosystem
description: A landing page for the comprehensive business plan of the Palawan Integrated Tourism, Investment & Infrastructure Ecosystem.

scripts.build: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');const fs=require('fs');execSync('rm -rf dist');fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});const hasPublic=fs.existsSync('public')&&fs.statSync('public').isDirectory();const src=hasPublic?'public':'.';execSync(`bash -lc \"shopt -s dotglob nullglob && cp -R ${src}/* dist/\"`);execSync('rm -rf dist/node_modules dist/dist dist/.git dist/.github || true');console.log('Static build created in dist/');"
scripts.start: npx http-server -p 3000 dist || echo "Use any static server locally if needed"
